name: Royal Casino: Video Poker
description: Do you consider yourself lucky? Are you cunning, tricky and prudent enough to fool anyone opposing you? If so, then show the people who the true king is!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: any
